<project name="TestBuild" default="dist" basedir=".">

	<exec dir="." executable="ant"/>

</project>

text:
"Ant" is not an exe, it is a batch file/shell script

on windows, you need to exec Ant.bat by running CMD.EXE / COMMAND.EXE with the 
bat file as the first name. 

Not an ant bug.
